message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might pay for it. Considering its true worth and your potential benefit, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product for $100. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, taking into account its value to you personally. Please let me know if you're interested in seizing this offer.
